# Visual Dividers Visual dividers are components that help organize content and create visual separation. ## Divider `view .html [ text "Section 1" divider text "Section 2" ]` ## Spacer `view .html [ text "Top" spacer 50 text "Bottom" ]` ## Split `view .html [ split [ text "Left Panel" ] [ text "Right Panel" ] ]` ## Divider Attributes - **divider**: Horizontal or vertical line - **spacer**: Fixed-size space - **split**: Resizable panel splitter ## See Also - [Containers](/wiki/core/components/containers/) - Container components - [Spacing & Padding](/wiki/core/layout/spacing-pad/) - Spacing control
